data.name: The Vagrant
data.detailed_description:
Set your adventure in gorgeous hand-painted fantasy world, Mythrilia, find out the truth of your bloodline and the darkest secret. Play as Vivian the Vagrant, a traveling sellsword, following your father’s research note to reunite with your family. Fighting your way from lush of mysterious forest to deep haunting castle, and leaving your foot print from ancient tribal remains to the edge of the world. After you finally discovered everything, what will be waiting for you?

The Vagrant

The Vagrant is an 2D action RPG. You can experience the exciting and stimulating adventure of Vivian the Vagrant. This focused on the combat gameplay, using combo chains, charge attacks and special skills in fighting, and improve your character build through equipment and unlocking abilities. It’s up to you whether play casually to enjoy the game or discover the possibility of your masterful maneuver.

Key Features:

  • Hand painted traditionally animated characters.
  • Flawless hardcore action combat.
  • 70+ deadly and dangerous monsters and beasts.
  • 6+ massive level sets, all beautifully hand painted.
  • Various weapons, armours and accessories to loot, purchase or discover.
  • A large scale skillset to enhance character build for immersive and intensive gameplay.
  • Craft and enchant your equipment that affect your combat performance.
  • Using various offensive skills to destroy your enemy, and evolve the skills by elemental enchanting.
  • Multiple ending to make your adventure even more unpredictable.
  • 10+ challenging Boss monster with well-designed AI and mechanics implemented. Fighting fully prepared or challenging in a deadly condition, it’s all your choice.
  • Monsterpedia that allow s you to collect monster data as you defeat them.
  • Fast-travel to previously visited areas to re-challenge or simply grinding.
  • Exciting and heart-touching music scores by Gabe Castro
  • Rich and unexpected storyline development.
  • 4 types of difficulty for either casual playing or hardcore fighting, all provided with full gameplay experiences.
  • Fully compatible with XboxONE controller.
